content: this heart mug rug free pattern includes chart detailed instructions packet photo tutorials video tutorials for each type of stitch used in the patterns size 7 x7 square *this calculation was based on stylecraft special dk yarn and hook size of 3 75mm gauge 5 stitched and 5 row=1 inch yarn color a- 42 yds design color color b- 46 yds background color i have a facebook group dedicated to answering questions and building community around my patterns please join us https //www facebook com/groups/heathernobledesigns
